name: Dirty Grandpa - Unrated: Lessons in Seduction
detailed_description: Aubrey Plaza’s character, “Lenore,” is on a mission, and she knows how to get what she wants. This piece takes us inside the creative and titillating mind of “Lenore” who teaches us her top 8 lessons in seducing men.
